meanings.definition: A suggestion or proposal for someone to consider.
meanings.sent1: My teacher gave me a recommendation to read a new book.
meanings.sent2: I asked my friend for a recommendation on which movie to watch.
meanings.sent3: The cat's recommendation to chase the mouse led to a funny chase around the house.
meanings.sent4: Her recommendation to try the new restaurant was like finding a hidden gem.
meanings.sent5: The doctor's recommendation to drink more water stuck with me and improved my health.

meanings.definition: The act of recommending or endorsing someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The recommendation from the manager helped me get the job.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate your recommendation for the best place to buy groceries.
meanings.sent3: The dog's recommendation of the squeaky toy as the best toy was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: His recommendation of the sunset as a painting subject was truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The chef's recommendation of the special dish made my dining experience unforgettable.
